official_title: A bill to eliminate the retroactive application of the provisions of the Omnibus Reconciliation Act of 1980 which require proration of initial adjustments to civil service annuities.

summary.text: Amends the Omnibus Reconciliation Act of 1980 to change the effective date of provisions requiring the proration of initial adjustments to civil service annuities.

titles.title: A bill to eliminate the retroactive application of the provisions of the Omnibus Reconciliation Act of 1980 which require proration of initial adjustments to civil service annuities.
